Keywords: Latveria , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Valeria Meghan Von Doom
Special Powers
THE MANY FACES OF DOOM: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a starting line of equal points on a character from your sideline that also has this trait. If you do, replace this character with the chosen character.
SMOKE AND MIRRORS: Shape Change, but succeeds on a 4-6. When Valeria Von Doom uses it and succeeds, after resolutions choose one: Place her X squares away from her current square where X is the result -or- Deal the attacker damage equal to half the result. Protected: Outwit.
YOU ARE NOT WORTHY OF MY ARMY!: When an opposing character that wasn't on their starting force misses, after resolutions give it an action token. If that character has [Autonomous symbol] instead KO it.
LURKING IN THE DISTANCE: Sidestep, Stealth.

Comments
April 2, 2021
tidge
Poor (full-cost) VVD... she was already a niche chase, but the 2021 changes continue to hurt her utility: no more pushing damage, her Willpower is useless, she cannot Perplex damage values, and even end dial Plasticity lost value. The high-stepping posture should have included improved movement!
March 28, 2021
FlashSpidey
So I'm really bad at this game. I don't get this piece. This is one of the few chases I have so I want to find a use for her but idk. Like, why would the opponent even attack her? And is she just out of luck against battle Fury or pulse wave? I just don't see how she is better than even the F4 Vakeria Rochards uncommon of 40 points. Could someone help?
February 16, 2021
Goop
Your "many faces" call in if your opponent is going to do a bunch of sideline switching. She has that annoying Stealth/Supersense/+1Shapechange thing going that can do back some damage and zip around. She is the hardest Doom to kill for sure but her damage is lacking. If you really want a Doom thats more def than offense then this is the one. Better at lower point value.
